alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 26 at 3:38AM MST until March 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 feet, with over 4 feet possible along southwest aspects. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph at times. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult along area roadways. Traction laws may be enacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected Sunday evening through Monday morning and Monday night into Tuesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
